title: WorkflowDefinition
description: Defines a workflow, having all the different pieces and attributes.

from.description: Element from which the edge will start.

to.description: Element on which the edge will end.

condition.description: If this condition is true, the workflow will follow this edge. Otherwise it won't.

endEvent.description: State on which the workflow might end.

name.description: Name that identifies this end event.

displayName.description: Display name that identifies this end event.

id.description: Unique identifier of this workflow definition.

name.description: Name that identifies this workflow definition.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this workflow definition.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.

startEvent.description: Event that triggers the start of the workflow.

endEvents.description: List of states on which the workflow might end.

processes.description: List of processes used on the workflow.

edges.description: List of edges that connect the workflow elements and guide its flow.
